#add_definitions(-DIL2CPP_TARGET_DARWIN)
add_definitions(-DIL2CPP_PLATFORM_SUPPORTS_TIMEZONEINFO=0)

add_definitions(-MMD)
#add_definitions(-MT dependencies)

include_directories(${IL2CPP_SOURCE_DIR}/external/)
